ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:55:38 [Issue ID 4000-103786] urn:comicvine:4000-103786 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 12:18:46. [Issue ID 230406]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Feel the heat as famed model and actress Alley Baggett comes alive in the pages of the new comic Alley Cat! Enter a twisted world of supernatural evil and Machiavellian deceit set in modern-day New Orleans, as one woman uncovers the truth behind the life of the Marquis de Sade and his notoriously bizarre exploits in the early 19th century. Swept up in the never-ending battle between competitive supernatural forces seeking control of earth, Alley undergoes a baptism of fire in an adventure that will shape the reality of the Third Millennium. From the creative minds behind Lady Pendragon, Avengelyne and Deity, comes Image's Alley Cat!
*Notes:* Special center pullout poster which is a larger and more complete version of the Wizard World cover. Photo by Bruce Brown and photo layout by Greg Aronowitz. One page text piece thanking the fans, a "special thanks to" section and a photo of Alley Baggett. "Alley Cat" "Who was the Marquis De Sade?" one page text piece by Matt Hawkins and Bob Napton. | Type | Edition | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |---------|--------------------------|-------------------|------------------| | Painted | Main Cover | Greg Aronowitz | 1 | | Photo | Another Universe Edition | Greg Aronowitz | 2 | | Photo | Wizard World Edition | Greg Aronowitz | 3 | | Photo | Dorian Painted Edition | Dorian Cleavenger | 4 | | Photo | | Greg Aronowitz | 5 |
